scripts.package:caesar:stable: npm run dev:discord:stable && cd caesar && npm run package
scripts.start:caesar:canary: npm run dev:discord:canary && cd caesar && npm run start
scripts.start:caesar:dev: npm run dev:discord:dev && cd caesar && npm run start
scripts.start:caesar:ptb: npm run dev:discord:ptb && cd caesar && npm run start
scripts.start:caesar:stable: npm run dev:discord:stable && cd caesar && npm run start
